results.title: A Trip to Wanderer's Paradise
results.brief_description: Laura reminisces about a very special holiday that happened at a time when she badly needed a break - an unexpected holiday that was like an answer to her prayers.

results.title: Gilmore girl
results.brief_description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.
results.description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. results.title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
results.creator_credit: George Nelson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.

results.title: The Land is your mother
results.creator_credit: Clive Atkinson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Clive “Bidja” Atkinson reminisces about his childhood, firstly in the Goulburn River region and then later in Echuca. He speaks of his love for the land and the Murray River and of his respect for the Yorta Yorta culture that has been passed on to him by his family. Clive became the first Koorie in Victoria to obtain a qualification in graphic design but no matter where his travels will take him, Clive will always return to the land of his mother.
results.description: Clive “Bidja” Atkinson reminisces about his childhood, firstly in the Goulburn River region and then later in Echuca. He speaks of his love for the land and the Murray River and of his respect for the Yorta Yorta culture that has been passed on to him by his family. Clive became the first Koorie in Victoria to obtain a qualification in graphic design but no matter where his travels will take him, Clive will always return to the land of his mother.

He speaks of his love for the land and the Murray River and of his respect for the Yorta Yorta culture that has been passed on to him by his family. Clive became the first Koorie in Victoria to obtain a qualification in graphic design but no matter where his travels will take him, Clive will always return to the land of his mother.
